name: Stationery Kid
description:
This Game was made as a part of the final major project for the team listed below.

@percivalcgd @TobyKershawCGD @kendemrena1 @KatrinaFilinska @Stephen62059063

Stationery Kid is a game where you battle your way through a deserted school destroying the demons that ravage your classmates. You can fend them off using a variety of stationery as weapons like protractors and rulers.
